QUERY: select max(empl_id) + 1 as id from employee
select sum(1) as counts from project_tasks pt inner join Project p on p.Project_id = pt.project_id
select pt.*, p.Project_name  from project_tasks pt inner join Project p on p.Project_id = pt.project_id
INSERT INTO project_tasks(task_name, task_discription, project_id) VALUES('$$$$taskname$$$$', '$$$$taskdiscription$$$$', $$$$project_id$$$$);
UPDATE project_tasks SET task_name='$$$$taskname$$$$', task_discription='$$$$taskdiscription$$$$', status = '$$$$taskstatus$$$$' WHERE id= $$$$taskid$$$$
